channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ByteDance’s Other AI Chatbot Is Quietly Gaining Traction Around the World
item.description: ByteDance is paying for ads and partnering with influencers to promote its AI chatbot app Cici in countries like the UK, Mexico, and Indonesia.

item.title: OpenAI pauses Sora video generations of Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: OpenAI is pausing AI video generations of Martin Luther King at the request of the late civil rights activists' estate.

item.title: Best Mattress 2025: We’ve Tested 100-Plus So You Can Sleep Soundly
item.description: WIRED has tested 100-plus bed-in-a-box mattresses for a week each. Our top pick, the Helix Midnight Luxe hybrid, is the best bed you can buy online.

item.title: Defunct electric aircraft startup Lilium’s tech lives on over at Archer
item.description: Archer prevailed in a competitive bidding process that included Ambitious Air Mobility Group and U.S. based Joby Aviation.

item.title: Reddit expands its AI-powered search to five new languages
item.description: Reddit announced Thursday that it is expanding its AI-powered search experience to five new languages: French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Portugues...

item.title: Meta previews new parental controls for its AI experiences
item.description: Meta on Friday previewed its upcoming parental control features for teens’ conversations with AI characters on its platforms. The features, which will...

item.title: The Bourbon Industry Is in Turmoil. Could Tech Provide the Shot It Needs?
item.description: The software-driven approach pioneered by a new Kentucky distillery runs counter to the low-tech methods of whiskey's old guard. Its mix of data and a...

item.title: How to See Comet Lemmon This October
item.description: This long-duration comet will make its closest approach to Earth this fall, before disappearing into the outer solar system for another 1,000 years.

item.title: The Blurred Truths of Sora
item.description: Many will assume that OpenAI’s Sora app represents a new era of social media. But that’s wrong—all it does is reanimate our current one.

item.title: VC legend Ron Conway quits Salesforce Foundation after Benioff’s National Guard comments
item.description: Ron Conway has been on the board of the Salesforce's philanthropic organization for 10 years.
